name: Macabre -demo version
description:
The demo version has been released!

You can download it for free below. Enjoy.

Story

One week before American Independence Day, Los Angeles was suddenly sealed off. Someone or something was turning people into monsters one after another. Derek, a veteran and ex-SWAT team member, is asked by the government to carry out a mission to fight off the monsters.

He is on a mission to find out the truth behind the horrific events that have occurred.

Information

This game is under development. You can play only stage 1 in the demo version. If you encounter any nasty glitches during gameplay, please contact us.

Game Features

Easy-to-use controls, exciting expressions, unique and flashy

Recommended OS

Windows 10 or higher

Warning

This game contains violent and sexual content and is not recommended for people under the age of 18.
